content.html: COVID Update: a new highly mutated variant nicknamed Centaurus (BA2.75) is emerging around the world. Even as BA.5 makes its mark in the US, Centatus has 11 unique mutations from BA.5. This gives a strong clue for what the future holds. 1/
content.value:
COVID Update: a new highly mutated variant nicknamed Centaurus (BA2.75) is emerging around the world. 

Even as BA.5 makes its mark in the US, Centatus has 11 unique mutations from BA.5. This gives a strong clue for what the future holds. 1/
